beer.beer_description:
Soft. Tropical. Juicy. 
Full-bodied and juicy, packed with orange, mango and pineapple, this one’s brewed to celebrate the lights in these hazy times.

Hop Bill: Azacca, Comet, Nugget, Samba, Idaho 7, Northern Brewer

Grain Bill: Briess Pilsen, White Wheat, Raw White Wheat, Red Wheat, Flaked Oats

items.badge_description: It takes the perfect amount of light, the right framing and a touch of creative love to get the perfect picture of your brew. Now it’s time to drink it! That's 420 check-ins with a photo.  Try 5 more for Level 85!

items.badge_description: Your quest to quench your thirst leaves no stone unturned! That's at least 190 distinct venues!
You're exploring this great country the best way possible, one delicious beer at a time! That's one beer while in at least 15 states or countries. Visit 5 more for Level 4!

items.badge_description: Thanks for staying at home, and checking in with Untappd! It allows us to stay connected to a community of beer lovers, just like you, even if we can't be in the same physical location. From our home to yours, cheers and stay safe!

It's time to give bottle shops some love by adding them as your purchased location. That's 50 check-ins with a purchased location! Tag 5 more to get to Level 11. Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast

Looking for more kick than a session beer, but want to be able to stay for a few rounds? You have to keep it in the middle. That's 330 beers with an ABV greater than 5% and less than 10%.  Try 5 more for Level 67!

Canning is all the rage and it's not hard to see why - travels well, more environmentally friendly, and no need to carry your bottle opener. That's 115 checkins with the serving style of Can. Try 5 more for Level 24! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast

items.badge_description: Whether you’re catching a matinee or at a midnight showing, why not enjoy your favorite brew - where available of course. Let’s face it, the beer is probably less than your ticket! That's a beer at 10 different places categorized as a Movie Theatre or Theatre. Try 5 more places for Level 3!

items.badge_description: You may not be able to see through the haze, but that juicy, hoppy goodness goes down smooth. What started as a trend is here to stay. That's 100 different beers with the style of IPA - New England / Hazy, Pale Ale - New England / Hazy, IPA - Milkshake, or Pale Ale - Milkshake. Try 5 more for Level 21!

items.badge_name: Cheers to Independent U.S. Craft Breweries (Level 33)
items.badge_description: Cheers, beer patriot! You are supporting the small and independent American craft brewer. When you see the seal -- shaped like an upside-down beer bottle -- that's independence you're tasting. Try 5 more to earn Level 34!
